document_notes.text:
This update for python-Babel fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-42771: Fixed relative path traversal (bsc#1185768).

notes.text: Babel.Locale in Babel before 2.9.1 allows attackers to load arbitrary locale .dat files (containing serialized Python objects) via directory traversal, leading to code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
